descriptionHtml:
Hi, my name is IMMAD , and this is my first upload ;) I'm very sorry for my english .

With "IMMAD'S CINEMATIC SweetFX" , Skyrim become more interesting and less boring ! Better colors , Better contrast , Better ... EVERYTHING , with tiny PERFORMANCE LOSS !

-Tested by me on :
------------------------------------------------------
[color=#FF0000]PC CONFIGURATION[/color]
------------------------------------------------------
Intel Core i7 2600 4.41 GHz
Gainward Phantom GTX760 4 Gb
8 Gb Ram
------------------------------------------------------
[color=#FF0000]SKYRIM CONFIGURATION[/color]
------------------------------------------------------
All setting to ULTRA
Antialiasing 8x
Anisotropic Filter 16x
------------------------------------------------------
[color=#FF0000]INSTALLATION[/color]
------------------------------------------------------
Installation is very simple ! Just drag an drop all "IMMAD'S CINEMATIC SweetFX " files from archive to your Skyrim root !
[color=#FF0000]IF YOU DON'T LIKE VIGNETTE EFFECT AROUND CORNERS , YOU CAN DISABLE IT CHANGING "1" TO "0" , IN "SweetFX_settings.ini" , LINE : "#define USE_VIGNETTE"[/color]
------------------------------------------------------
[color=#FF0000]RECOMMENDED MODS[/color]
------------------------------------------------------
Recommended mods are listed in the second image ;P
------------------------------------------------------
[color=#FF0000]CHANGELOG[/color]
---------------------------------------------------
18/04/2014 - Added "IMMAD'S CINEMATIC SweetFX" - Less Saturation/Brightness
18/04/2014 - Added "IMMAD'S CINEMATIC SweetFX" - Borders Edition
author: IMMAD
